summary: Feature request to allow codec/custom data converter to process headers, particularly OpenTelemetry baggage headers, with contextual information passed to encode/decode operations.
userImpact: Users cannot currently route headers through custom codecs, limiting ability to apply custom serialization logic to header data like OpenTelemetry baggage.
proposedFix: Allow codec to be run on headers with contextual information passed to Codec.encode/decode methods, with OTEL baggage as the default use case.
keyQuote: by default, don't put headers through codec / custom data converter, except for otel baggage
